name: If you try hard enough, you can win.
name_original: If you try hard enough, you can win.
description:
If you try hard enough, you can win.

Or can you? (Spoilers: No.) A chaotic little shooty looty made for Ludum Dare 50. Built with Phaser, Aseprite, Bfxr, & BeepBox.

Good luck!

[CONTROLS]
Movement: WASD
Aim: Cursor
Shoot: Hold OR Click LMB
